title: Gingitsune
synopsis: Gintarou is a fox spirit that has been protecting the small Inari temple since the Edo era. Saeki Makoto's family possesses the power to see the gods' agent, but the ability is limited to one living relative at a time. When Makoto's mother passed away while she was still young, Makoto inherited the ability as the sole remaining family member. With the help of fox spirit's power, Makoto and Gintarou help the people of their community, in spite of their many differences. (Source: MangaHelpers, edited)

details.English: Gingitsune: Messenger Fox of the Gods
details.Japanese: ぎんぎつね

title: Puchitto Gargantia
synopsis: Short episodes streamed on the anime's official site after every episode, giving background information about the show.

details.Japanese: ぷちっとがるがんてぃあ

synopsis: Special episode bundled with the BD.

title: Ikeike! Momon-chan Specials
synopsis: Specials that streamed earlier on in the season, featuring new characters and cameos by Momon-chan and Tanu. (Source: Migoto Fansubs)

details.Japanese: いけいけ！ももんちゃん 戯

title: Lupin III vs. Detective Conan: The Movie
synopsis: It is a cross over between the series Lupin III and Detective Conan and takes place after the television special Lupin the 3rd vs Detective Conan. The plot follows Conan Edogawa who sets out to apprehend Arsène Lupin III, the suspect of stealing a jewel called Cherry Sapphire. (Souce: Wikipedia)

details.Synonyms: Rupan Sansei vs. Meitantei Conan: The Movie, Rupan Sansei vs Meitantei Conan (Movie)
details.Japanese: ルパン三世vs.名探偵コナン THE MOVIE

title: Blood Lad: Wagahai wa Neko de wa Nai
synopsis: Bundled with the tenth limited-edition volume of Blood Lad manga.

details.Japanese: ブラッドラッド 我輩は猫ではない

title: Field ni Soyogu Kaze
synopsis: Trying to prove he is the better soccer player, Kenji tackles and injures Yuta's leg during a trial for the school team. Impressed by the fact that Yuta still does what he can to contribute to the team; Kenji begins to realize the true meaning of sportsmanship.

details.Japanese: フィールドにそよぐ風

title: Spheres
synopsis: Unbeknownst to human history, the Kingdom of Spheres existed upon our earth long ago. The people of this kingdom would be regarded today as people with psychic powers. Unfortunately, like most other civilizations, as the gap widened more and more between the social classes, the Kingdom of Spheres was troubled by those greedy for power; and in the end it collapsed. Na Yeon is a mysterious girl who was found in the Antarctic after the destruction of Spheres. One day Asten, the chairman of Sphere Union, who has a burning ambition to control the world, sent his followers to keep watch on Na Yeon. Na Yeon and her friends try to keep three artifacts, the keys to conquer the world, from the hands of Sphere Union. (Source: Wikipedia)

details.Japanese: 스피어즈

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Battlefield Record: Avant-Title
synopsis: A short animation serving as a prequel to the events depicted in the PlayStation 3 game, Mobile Suit Gundam: Battlefield Record U.C. 0081. (Source: AniDB)

details.Synonyms: Kidou Senshi Gundam Senki: Avant Title
details.Japanese: 機動戦士ガンダム戦記 アバンタイトル

title: Don: Gokudou Suikoden
synopsis: Takekichi and Masakazu are two tough guys who are forced to go underground when they lose their boss in a turf war in this modern update of the classic Chinese novel "Water Margin".  (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

details.Japanese: ドン 極道水滸伝

title: M Ogui: Last Order
synopsis: Anime adaptation of the same name manga by Kurosugi Shinsaku.  Rina and Shiori are two women who are not to be messed with. One night, when out late in the karaoke bar, the staff of the karaoke bar tries to take advantage of the two ladies. There is a disagreement about the bill, but the two ex-gang ladies fight back. As revenge they decide to rape the karaoke staff and force them to have sex with each other.

details.Japanese: M男食い ラストオーダー

title: Hanasaka Jijii
synopsis: Short movie produced by the first generation animator Kitayama Seitarou. Based on the Japanese fairy tale Hanasaka Jiijii, also called Hanasaka Jiisan.

details.Synonyms: Old Man Hanasaka, The Grandfather Who Makes The Flowers, Hanasaka Jiisan
details.Japanese: 花咲爺

title: Sign
synopsis: Music video for the song 'Sign' by Nobukazu Takemura Animation done by Katsura Moshino

details.Japanese: Sign

title: Genshiken Nidaime
synopsis: Another college semester begins and the returning members of Genshiken attempt to recruit new club members. Three new members join the club, attracted by Ogiue's BL drawings. She welcomes the new members but fears the club will become a "fujoshi" haven for yaoi fans and is getting a bit too far removed from its original purpose. (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture, Genshiken Second Generation
details.Japanese: げんしけん 二代目

title: Odoriko Clinoppe
synopsis: The surreal, comical television anime follow the daily life of Clinoppe and an office lady named Onei-san. (Source: ANN) Based on GREE's Odoriko Clinoppe Creature-Raising Game.

synopsis: A mix of animation and live-action.

details.Japanese: ごっくんドール 超次元ピッコちゃん登場!!

synopsis: A mix of animation and live-action.

details.Japanese: まなみの未知との遭入!?

title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Tu Nian Ding Gua Gua
synopsis: The spring festival is around corner, but Mr. wolf doesn't feel happy at all. Mrs. Wolf is going to have baby, but Mr. Wolf can't catch any sheep. What is more, their castle is torn down making them homeless. Mr. Wolf needs to fight back.  In the mean time, a sheep from the moon returns and tells the other sheep the secret of the sugar moon. The sheep go to the moon but are followed by wolfs. They are going to have war on the moon.  Filled with different sorts of yummy candies, Moon used to be a paradise for those with a sweet tooth. It's also the residence of the Moon fairy and her magical rabbit. But one day the Lord of Bitterness invades Moon with the intention of making their happy life miserable. The rabbit escapes to Earth and seeks help from Pleasant Goat, who then leads a ragtag group of rescuers - including his nemesis Big Big Wolf - to restore peace on Moon. (Source: YesAsia & China Image Film Festival)

details.English: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: Moon Castle - The Space Adventure
details.Synonyms: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf Movie 3: Moon Castle - The Space Adventure
details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼 之兔年顶瓜瓜

title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Kaixin Chuang Long Nian
synopsis: It is said that there is a thousands years old treasure that must be found before it fall into the wrong hands, and the Dragon flute which only the real descendant of the dragon can open the door of the treasure. It's a race against time and full onslaught of enemies to stop the heroes from there quest. (Source: AniDB)

details.English: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf: Mission Incredible: Adventures on the Dragon's Trail
details.Synonyms: Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf Movie 4: Mission Incredible - Adventures on the Dragon's Trail
details.Japanese: 喜羊羊与灰太狼 之开心闯龙年

title: Kitakubu Katsudou Kiroku
synopsis: When a friend asks Natsuki what high school club she's going to join, she cheerfully responds "the go-home club" (meaning, she's not going to join any of them). However, she soon realizes that this club actually exists at her high school, and she's just expressed interest in joining it! Before she knows it, she ends up as one of the two new members of "the go-home club," which is a small group of eccentric school girls. One of the girls likes fighting bears, while another is ridiculously rich. But what exactly constitutes the activities of "the go-home club"? (Source: MangaHelpers)

details.English: Chronicles of the Going Home Club
details.Japanese: 帰宅部活動記録

title: Yozakura Quartet: Hana no Uta
synopsis: Hundreds of years ago, the borders between the worlds of humans and youkai temporarily overlapped, resulting in many residents of both crossing over to the other side. In the years since this event, the city of Sakurashin has become a central hub for all inter-dimensional affairs—a result of both the sacred Seven Pillars around the city serving as a beacon for the youkai, and the efforts of the Hiizumi Life Counseling Office in keeping the townsfolk happy. This office is composed of Hime Yarizakura, the young mayor of the city; satori Ao Nanami, who can read people's minds; half-youkai Kotoha Isone, who can summon anything by speaking a word; oni siblings, Kyousuke and Touka Kishi; and the office director Akina Hiizumi, who inherited his family's ability to force youkai back to their world. Besides volunteer and arbitration work, the Life Counseling Office also suppresses any Strikes: rare occurrences where humans are suddenly infused with youkai powers and go on a rampage. But the appearance of a sinister man signals trouble as Strikes become increasingly common, political rivals make their moves, and malicious individuals descend upon the city. As the self-appointed defenders of Sakurashin, it's up to the Life Counseling Office to protect the idyllic city they call home!
background: Episode 1 was previewed at a screening in Tokyo on September 28, 2013. Regular broadcasting began on October 6, 2013.

details.Japanese: 夜桜四重奏 ～ハナノウタ～

title: Yozakura Quartet: Tsuki ni Naku
synopsis: "Tsuki ni Naku" will take the story content from volume 11 of the manga, which features a visit to a onsen by the members of the Hiizumi Life Councelling Office, while the town's police force have to deal with a new youkai-hunter threat. This OVA is bundled with the limited edition of the manga (14th, 15th, and 16th).

details.Japanese: 夜桜四重奏 ツキニナク
